block.p: Deirdre Ryan Frouge and Peter Joachim Schmole were married yesterday at the Explorers Club in New York. Andrew N. Grass Jr., an acting village justice in Ossining, N.Y., officiated.

Mrs. Schmole, 41, works in New York for Nasdaq, the electronic stock market, where she is a director of issuer services, providing customer and public relations advice to companies that have issued stock. She graduated from Marymount Manhattan College. She is a daughter of Joan Frouge of Rancho Bernardo, Calif., and the late Thomas Frouge, who was the chairman of the Frouge Corporation, a real estate company in New York. The bride's previous marriage ended in divorce.
Deirdre Ryan Frouge and Peter Joachim Schmole were married yesterday at the Explorers Club in New York. Andrew N. Grass Jr., an acting village justice in Ossining, N.Y., officiated.

Mrs. Schmole, 41, works in New York for Nasdaq, the electronic stock market, where she is a director of issuer services, providing customer and public relations advice to companies that have issued stock. She graduated from Marymount Manhattan College. She is a daughter of Joan Frouge of Rancho Bernardo, Calif., and the late Thomas Frouge, who was the chairman of the Frouge Corporation, a real estate company in New York. The bride's previous marriage ended in divorce.

Mr. Schmole, 43, is now the vice president for marketing for SG Cowen Asset Management in New York. He was a scuba diver and a Marine sergeant with the Second Recon Battalion. He is the son of Emma and Jack Schmole of Palm Coast, Fla. His parents, now retired, owned the Yonkers Pastry shop in Yonkers.
